name: Super Emoji Keyboard - Keyboard Themes, GIF, Emoji
description: Super Emoji Keyboard provides you with free emojis, popular gifs and keyboard themes, allows you to easily type words in a super fast & accurate way. Super emoji keyboard is one of the best keyboard apps for Android. This powerful keyboard covers emoji keyboard, gif keyboard, sticker keyboard, and free keyboard themes, cool fonts, various keyboard types, auto correction and next word prediction.   Upgrade your phones keyboard to Super Emoji Keyboard for free! Enjoy every tap and personalize your emoji keyboard!  Super Emoji Keyboard is a free emoji keyboard app that makes your typing fast, fun and accurate. Packed with thousands of funny emojis, smiley faces and stylish keyboard themes making the emoji keyboard a must-have free emoji keyboard for android devices!  Super Emoji Keyboard, a powerful emoji keyboard with amazing features, is designed for those who like sending messages with emoji. Are you getting bored with plain Android keyboard? Get this funny emoji keyboard!   What makes Super Emoji Keyboard so special?  Stylish Keyboard Themes: Super Emoji Keyboard integrates all amazing features into one app from many emoji keyboard. It will make your Android keyboard looking amazing with hundreds of themes. A lot of free keyboard themes are available to suit any style. A lot of keyboards themes such as emoji keyboard  Exclusive Keyboard for Emoji Lover: Super Emoji Keyboard does not only offer emoji keyboard themes, but suggests emoji by predicting what you typed. Easy to type Emojis in the text messages, social media posts, emails, etc.  Personalized Keyboard Customization: Super Emoji Keyboard is a smart and fun keyboard app for Android phone that makes your typing easy, fast and funny by helping your customize keyboard with different themes, colors, and QWERTY Keyboard, QWERTZ Keyboard and AZERTY keyboard   Fast Typing Smart Word Prediction & Auto-Correction: Super Emoji Keyboard uses AI-powered predictions to auto learn your writing style, including the emoji you frequently use, the words that matter to you and how you like to type, which means autocorrect and predictive text that actually works. Smart enough to recognize mistyping, provide correction suggestions and make your typing easy  Any questions or feedback, please email us: david.wang.jack@gmail.com
